definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: They have cherished the child as one of their own.
sentences.chinese: 他們把這個小孩當作自己的親生子女來撫養。

sentences.english: I can’t bear to see old people being maltreated by their own children.
sentences.chinese: 我不忍心看到老人受到他們親生子女的虐待。

sentences.english: He says the effort will be to assist people who want to have their own biological child.
sentences.chinese: 他說這一成果將會幫助那些想要得到親生子女的人們。
